name: RAIGARH AMBIKAPUR HEALTH ASSOCIATION
briefDescription: RAHA works to increase health care facilities in remote area of eastern part of Chhattisgah. It works in three level- 1st village level, 2nd rural health centre level & 3rd referral hospital level. RAHA believe prevention is better than cure. to fulfill this more than 1500 volunteer work in the field with RAHA's 93 RHCs & 3 referral hospitals in 6 districts of Chhattisgah. Through various projects RAHA reaches to achieve better health facility, education, rehabilitation, awareness & nutrition among approximately 10 Lac beneficiaries.
